revised_title: A Philosophical and Historical Treatise on the Aurora Borealis
tldr: The author presents a historical and philosophical analysis of the Aurora Borealis, exploring its causes and the role of the Zodiacal Light in its formation. The work covers the history of meteor observations, the atmosphere of the Earth, and the nature of the Zodiacal Light, as well as proposing a hypothesis for the dependence of other natural phenomena on this new understanding.
